subject: Soccer
Attorneys General
Corruption (Institutional)
Bribery and Kickbacks
lead_paragraph: Less than a month into her job as attorney general, Ms. Lynch captured the world’s attention when she vowed to rid FIFA, soccer’s governing body, of corruption.
snippet: Less than a month into her job as attorney general, Ms. Lynch captured the world’s attention when she vowed to rid FIFA, soccer’s governing body, of corruption.
